appetizers.name: Python fingers

ingredients.sides: French fries, Sweet potatoe fries, Chips

appetizers.description: Delicious, long strips of chicken, battered in our homestyle recipe and fried to crispy perfection.

coldSandwiches.name: The CSS Sandwich
coldSandwiches.description: Choose your bread and veggies on this tasty Blackforest ham cold sandwich that is topped with jalepeno peppers, pepper jack cheese, and our own spicy sauce.

hotSandwiches.name: The HTM MeLt
hotSandwiches.description: The cheddar in this melt brings out the rich mesquite flavor in the turkey, which is topped with our own ranch-style sauce.

desserts.name: DOM Sundae

ingredients.toppings: Nuts, whipcream, cherry, caramel, banana slices

desserts.description: This delicious sundae brings all your favorite elements together.

drinks.name: Bootstrap in a bottle
drinks.description: These brewed-on-site sodas will blow your mind! Choose a fruit to squeeze a little extra zing into your drink.
